column1: Which document formally separated the 13 English colonies from Great Britain and announced the birth of a new country, the United States of America?
What was a religious movement in the 1730s and 1740s that emphasized Jesus Christ and individual responsibility?
The French and the Indians fought the British and the English colonists for control over North America in which war from 1754-1763?
Which young English colonist fought in the French and Indian War as an officer?
Who was King of Great Britain during the American Revolution?
